title: My Graphic Design Journey
subtitle: Creativity and Aesthetics
description: I believe in the power of design. Every pixel, every color, and every typography choice is part of bringing my vision to life. In my work, I seek the perfect combination of modernity, aesthetics, and functionality.
bio: As a graphic designer, I work on brand identity design, UI/UX design, social media content, and creative campaigns. I bring a unique perspective to each project and deliver original and impactful designs.

gallery.title: Brand Identity Design
gallery.description: Corporate brand design - Logo, color palette, typography system

gallery.title: Web UI Design
gallery.description: Responsive UI design and prototyping for e-commerce platform

gallery.title: Social Media Campaign
gallery.description: Visual content design for digital marketing - Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn

gallery.title: Illustration Works
gallery.description: Editorial and creative works - Custom illustrations and vector art

gallery.title: Product Design
gallery.description: Physical product packaging design, labeling, and 3D visualization

gallery.title: Typography Work
gallery.description: Font design and typographic experimental works - Poster design

video.title: Design Process
video.description: A video presentation of my design process, how my ideas come to life, and my design philosophy.
